Others: For the first time in its 55-year history, the Cleveland Cavaliers have kicked off an NBA season with an impressive 9-0 record.
Coach Kenny Atkinson became the first coach in league history to achieve this record in his first year with a new team.
The Cavaliers defeated the New Orleans Pelicans 131-122 to reach this historic mark.
Donovan Mitchell scored 29 points in the game.
The Cavaliers have led the NBA in field goal percentage with 52.6% so far this season.
